storePassword.description:
> WARNING. this prop is sensitive and should not be stored in standard `renative.json` configs. use `renative.private.json` files instead!

storePassword for keystore file

keyPassword.description:
> WARNING. this prop is sensitive and should not be stored in standard `renative.json` configs. use `renative.private.json` files instead!

keyPassword for keystore file

private.description: Special object which contains private info. this object should be used only in `renative.private.json` files and never commited to your repository. Private files usually reside in your workspace and are subject to crypto encryption if enabled. RNV will warn you if it finds private key in your regular `renative.json` file
